DH * DH_generate_parameters (int prime_len, int generator, void(*callback)(int, int, void *), void *cb_arg)
 Generates Diffie-Hellman Parameters prime_len from 65 to 8192 bits are supported.

Function Documentation

DH* DH_generate_parameters (  int    prime_len,
int    generator,
void(*    callback)(int, int, void *),
void *    cb_arg
) 
 

Generates Diffie-Hellman Parameters prime_len from 65 to 8192 bits are supported.

This generator function can take a very very long time to run.

Parameters:
prime_len  The length of the prime to be generated
generator  Generator is a small number
callback  Callback to be called
cb_arg  Callback arguments
Returns:
Success: Pointer to the DH structure Failure: NULL
